home_message: Welcome to @golos_stake_bot. You can use it to set up automatic curation or participate in bids. Your invitee:
enter_tags: Enter the tags to change, separated by commas (no transliteration) or click 'cancel'. List of tags:
type_vote_percent: Enter the percentage of voting for or against the post. Account battery
not_connection: There is no connection to the Node or there is no such account.
vote_error: Error sending a vote for a post. Details:
new_referal1: A first-level referral has been registered using your link. Invite more and earn:
new_referal2: A second-level referral has been registered using your link. Invite more and earn:
posting_not_found: Posting key was not found in the list of account keys, or there was an error connecting to the Node. Please check and try again.
account_not_add: The account was not added to the bot is database.
posting_not_valid: Posting key is not in the correct format.
accounts_list: List of your accounts (type on the command to change it with @):
select_account: select an account by clicking on one of the buttons
delete_conferm: Do you really want to delete this user? Login:
not_account: The account was not found or there was an error connecting to the node.
change_account: Select what you want to change of account
type_posting: keep Posting key (it will be encrypted)
saved_posting_key: Posting key was saved successfully. Login:
saved_true: The data has been successfully saved. Now you can set up an autocurator or place bets.
not_saved: This is not saved. The account does not belong to your Telegram id
enter_login: Enter your Golos account login without @
auto_curator_text: Select the auto curator settings item. Current settings
enter_min_energy: Enter the minimum percentage of the battery at which to allow apat.
min_energy_saved: The parameter of the minimum percentage of the battery for automatic curation is saved.
min_energy_not_valid: You have specified an invalid percentage of battery (you need a number with a dot as a separator, for example, 94.25 or 95)
curators_text: Enter the list of curators you want to repeat after, separated by commas without spaces.
curators_saved: The list of curators is saved
curators_not_valid: The list of curators is invalid. Check the entered data.
favorits_text: Enter the list of favorites you want to vote for, separated by commas without spaces. Or click on the import subscriptions button, but keep in mind that the list of favorites will be replaced.
favorits_saved: The list of favorites is saved
favorits_not_valid: List favorites are invalid. Check the entered data.
curators_mode_text: Do you really want to enable the curator percentage repeat mode?
curators_mode_off: Curator percentage repeat is disabled. There will be a vote with 100% force.
favorits_percent_saved: The percentage of voting for favorites is saved.
favorits_percent_not_valid: The percentage for favorites is invalid. Enter a number without the %sign.
curators_coeff_text: Enter the repeat coefficient for the curator. The percentage of apa will be divided by it. For example, if the curator voted 100%, and you have a coefficient of 2, your percentage will be 50%.
curators_coeff_not_valid: The repeat coefficient is not valid. Specify a number, for example, 2 or 1.
auto_donate_text: With this function, you can use a personal pool of distribution between authors that you like. Specify the percentage of the daily issue that will be spent at 100% upvote, as well as the coefficient of change in the donation amount. Example: 10 1.1 (If it is different from 1, there will be a non-linear decrease in the amount of the donation depending on the percentage of the upvote. Minimum 1 1 (1% with a coefficient of 1). Also keep in mind that the minimum donation amount = 0.5 GOLOS (anything less will be skipped).
auto_donate_not_valid: Personal pool parameters specified incorrectly. Enter 2 numbers separated by a space or one if you want to leave a coefficient of 1. Example: 10 1.2 or just 10
audo_donate_description: Personal pool (percentage of issue and distribution coefficient)
exclude_authors_text: Enter a list of logins of authors whose posts you do not want to receive in the bot and apat, separated by commas without spaces and @. Currently selected
exclude_authors_saved: The list of excluded authors is saved
exclude_authors_not_valid: The list of excluded authors is invalid. Check the entered data.
keywords_text: Enter a list of keywords that you want to search for in the texts of posts. It is possible with spaces, separate the words with commas. Now installed
keywords_saved: The list of keywords is saved
post_from_keyword: ðŸ†• post on the keywords from
unvote_ok: You have successfully removed the upvote from this post
unvote_failed: Connection error with the node, there is no such account or another error.
postActions_select_account: Select an account for actions with the post.
type_donate: Enter the amount of donation, the commission is 0.2%. Minimum 0.1 GOLOS, maximum:
donate_not_valid: Donat is invalid, less than 0.1 GOLOS or more than the maximum.
donate_confirm: Do you really want to send a donation? Amount:
type_rate: Enter the bid, the commission is 10%. Minimum 0.1 golos, maximum:
rate_not_valid: The bid is invalid, less than 0.1 GOLOS or greater than the maximum.
rate_conferm: Do you really want to place a bet? Amount:
rate_true: The bid was sent successfully. Wait for the result at 18:00 Moscow time. You can view your bid number here: https://dpos.space/golos/stakebot
rate_msg2: was the winner because it was numbered
rate_msg3: Unfortunately, you did not win. Your number is
rate_msg4: The winner was the participant with the number
jackpot_msg2: Got the jackpot because it was a number
jackpot_msg3: unfortunately, you did not get the jackpot. Your number is
jackpot_msg4: the participant Received it under the number
help_text: Overview of the bot in Russian: https://golos.id/ru--golos/@lllll1ll/rukovodstvo-po-podklyucheniyu-k-stake-bot. If you have any questions or problems, write to the chat @dpos_space or personal to @denis_skripnik
